channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The State of the ‘Star Trek’ Universe Coming Into ‘Starfleet Academy’
item.description: Need a reminder of what's up in the farthest frontier of 'Star Trek' before 'Starfleet Academy'? Class is now in session.

item.title: L’écart s’agrandit : cette alternative à Windows va encore gagner en puissance
item.description: Le logiciel de compatibilité Wine passe à la version 11 et promet de jolis gains en matière de performances.

item.title: Amazon partners with Roku to expand its collection of free streaming content – here’s where you can access its 50 new channels
item.description: Fire TV is getting another slew of free streaming channels, now you can watch The Roku Channel without a Roku device.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs smartphones Xiaomi, Redmi Note et Poco en 2026 ?
item.description: Vous êtes à la recherche d'un guide détaillé des différents téléphones Xiaomi ? Nous avons testé et sélectionné au sein du vaste catalogue les références pour vous aider à choisir le meilleur smartphone Xiaomi, Redmi ou Poco.

item.title: Is a 'poor productivity climate' killing your efficiency? Most workers say returning to the office is making us a lot less productive
item.description: New report uncovers the detrimental effects loud noise and poor air quality can have on worker productivity.

item.title: Robotics software maker Skild AI hits $14B valuation
item.description: Skild AI, which is building general-purpose robotic software, just raised a $1.4 billion funding round led by SoftBank.

item.title: Civilization VII is coming to Apple Arcade
item.description: Sid Meier's Civilization VII is headed to the Apple Arcade on February 5th, allowing you to play the strategy game across your iPhone, iPad, or Mac through the company's $6.99 / month subscription. The game has the same premise as the original PC title, where you're tasked with expanding your empire as historic leaders from […]

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs aspirateurs balais laveurs en 2026 ?
item.description: Les aspirateurs balai laveurs combinent l'aspiration des sols avec un lavage à l'eau propre, qui peut même être combiné avec de la vapeur ou du détergent. Voici notre sélection des meilleurs modèles d'aspirateurs balais laveurs.

item.title: The latest Animal Crossing: New Horizons expansion has arrived earlier than expected
item.description: For a number of very obvious reasons, we don’t want to roll back the clock to early 2020. No thank you. But if there was a feel-good lockdown story, it was the perfectly timed arrival of Animal Crossing: New Horizons, which allowed friends who could no longer meet up IRL to do so virtually on their carefully pruned islands. The game will almost certainly never be as popular as it was back then again, but Nintendo is hoping a good chunk of lapsed islanders will return for its latest DLC drop, which has arrived a day earlier than planned. As spotted by Eurogamer, the free Animal Crossing: New Ho...

item.title: The Mac mini M4 is back on sale for $499
item.description: The holiday season may be behind us, but that doesn't mean you can't still find good deals on some of our favorite tech. Take the Apple Mac mini M4, which is on sale for $100 off. The 17 percent discount gives you 16GB of RAM and 256GB of SSD for $499, which is only about $20 more than its Black Friday sale price. Its beefier models are also on sale: opting for 512GB of SSD will cost you $689, down from $799, while also upping your RAM to 24GB is available for $890, dropping from $999. We gave the Apple Mac mini M4 a 90 in our review thanks in large part to its powerful chip. The M4 works ver...

item.title: Quand Copilot invente le passé : l’énorme boulette de l’IA de Microsoft dans un rapport de police officiel
item.description: Se servir d'une intelligence artificielle capable d'halluciner pour rédiger un rapport de renseignement n'est pas une très bonne idée.

item.title: Parents can put a time limit on YouTube Shorts scrolling
item.description: Parents can now manually set a time limit on their kids' YouTube Shorts feed, ranging from fifteen minutes to two hours (with an option for zero minutes coming soon). The update, announced on Wednesday, takes the Shorts time limit feature YouTube introduced in October and adapts it for under-18 accounts. Kids and teens can't change […]

item.title: Carrefour met en promo un tas de produits Tech durant les soldes : les 12 deals à saisir de la 2e démarque
item.description: La 2e démarque des soldes d'hiver est lancée et Carrefour s’y met en baissant le prix de plusieurs produits high-tech. Des TV aux smartphones en passant par les trottinettes électriques, il y en a pour tous les goûts ! Voici notre sélection des meilleures offres de l’enseigne.

item.title: Gemini can now pull context the rest of your Google apps, if you let it
item.description: Gemini is adding a feature that’s designed to feel more tailored to individual users. Once enabled, "Personal Intelligence" can pull context from across your Google ecosystem, including Gmail, Google Photos, Search and YouTube History, to gain specific insight that will shape its answers and recommendations. Personal Intelligence is available starting today in the US for Google AI Pro and Ultra subscribers. The feature is opt-in only and is off by default. Google Google says users will have the ability to control what apps Gemini pulls from and, in the future, which chats it uses Personal Inte...

item.title: Satellite Data Exposes a Hidden Flood Threat Endangering 236 Million People
item.description: Densely populated river deltas are sinking faster than sea levels are rising, according to new research.

item.title: Trump Doesn’t Need the Proud Boys Anymore
item.description: In a world where ICE agents are shooting US citizens on the street, the need for militias and extremist groups like the Proud Boys to support far-right interests has evaporated.

item.title: Google’s Gemini AI will use what it knows about you from Gmail, Search, and YouTube
item.description: Google's Gemini AI is getting what could prove to be a very big upgrade: To help answers from Gemini be more personalized, the company is going to let you connect the chatbot to Gmail, Google Photos, Search, and your YouTube history to provide what Google is calling "Personal Intelligence." This isn't the first time Google […]

item.title: Gemini’s new beta feature provides proactive responses based on your photos, emails, and more
item.description: Personal Intelligence is off by default, as users have the option to choose if and when they want to connect their Google apps to Gemini.

item.title: Chelsea vs Arsenal Free Streams: How to watch Carabao Cup semi-final 2025/26 from anywhere in the world
item.description: All the ways to watch Chelsea vs Arsenal live streams, as Liam Rosenior looks to crack the Mikel Arteta blueprint in the Carabao Cup semi-final first leg.

item.title: Gemini gets its biggest upgrade yet 'Personal Intelligence' that uses your Gmail, Photos, Search and YouTube history - and it could be our first glimpse of the new Siri in iOS 27
item.description: Gemini's new Personal Intelligence feature is now live, and it gives users an AI personal assistant similar to the one Apple promised Siri would become.

item.title: Voici « Personal Intelligence » : Gemini enfonce le clou
item.description: Google continue la remontada de Gemini avec le lancement de « Personal Intelligence » pour rendre son IA beaucoup plus pertinente et sur mesure.

item.title: Trump Warned of a Tren de Aragua ‘Invasion.’ US Intel Told a Different Story
item.description: Hundreds of records obtained by WIRED show thin intelligence on the Venezuelan gang in the United States, describing fragmented, low-level crime rather than a coordinated terrorist threat.

item.title: This IKEA donut lamp has invaded my dreams, and now I want nothing but to own 12 of them
item.description: A popular IKEA desk lamp gets a major smart and color upgrade.

item.title: Bandcamp becomes the first major music platform to ban AI content
item.description: Bandcamp has built its entire brand around serving artists. And, with the artist furor over AI growing every day, it's no surprise that the company has decided to take a stand against it. In a Reddit post, Bandcamp announced that AI-generated content would not be permitted on the platform and would be subject to removal. […]

item.title: How the Definition of ‘Doxxing’ Is Being Twisted Into a Weapon of Anonymity
item.description: From a journalist's tweet about Venezuela to the identity of the ICE agent who shot Renee Good, the debate over doxxing seems to be everywhere.

item.title: AI security firm, depthfirst, announces $40 million series A
item.description: The company used an AI-native platform to help companies fight threats.

item.title: Roblox tente la vérification de l’âge et se plante magistralement
item.description: Après de nombreuses plaintes et polémiques, Roblox a décidé de prendre le taureau par les cornes en mettant en place un système de vérification de l'âge. Actif dans de nombreux pays depuis quelques jours, le dispositif n'est pas obligatoire sauf pour accéder aux espaces de discussion de la plateforme. Malheureusement, la vérification de l'âge, basée sur l'analyse vidéo du visage de l'utilisateur, fonctionne très mal....

item.title: US cargo tech company publicly exposed its shipping systems and customer data to the web
item.description: Shipping tech company Bluspark left internal plaintext passwords, including those of executives, exposed to the internet, at a time when hacks in the shipping industry are on the rise.

item.title: Pew! Pew! YouTuber Builds Sound Laser That Works as ‘Invisible Speaker’
item.description: Don't sell your hi-fi just yet.

item.title: GoFundMe campaign for Ford worker TJ Sabula quickly tops $90K in latest politically charged fundraiser
item.description: The crowdfunding platform is increasingly finding itself at the center of major political news stories in the early weeks of 2026. A GoFundMe page is raising thousands to support a worker at the Ford Rouge Plant in Dearborn, Michigan, after he openly criticized President Trump—to his face.

item.title: Python libraries used in top AI and ML tools hacked - Nvidia, Salesforce and other libraries all at risk
item.description: The bugs have been fixed, so users should patch now, experts warn.

item.title: How to do an in-depth portfolio review with these 8 steps
item.description: Take these key steps to make over your portfolio. If you’d like to do a thorough review of your portfolio and plan, here are the key steps to take. I recommend doing them over a series of sessions, not all at once.

item.title: You Will Hear the ‘Game of Thrones’ Theme in ‘A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms’ (But Not in the Way You’d Expect)
item.description: Showrunner Ira Parker explains how the iconic music finds its way into HBO's latest journey to George R.R. Martin's Westeros.

item.title: DJI Neo 2 review: I guess I’m a drone guy now
item.description: I'm not a drone guy. In fact, I've always been a bit nervous to play around with them too much. They're big, fragile, and expensive, which is a dangerous combination for someone with my hand-eye coordination. But I've always sort of wanted one, mostly because I've been jealous of the mid-air photos and videos I've […]

item.title: Samsung met le paquet pour la 2e démarque des soldes d’hiver : le TOP 14 des offres
item.description: Les appareils Samsung ne sont pas épargnés pendant la deuxième démarque des soldes. Envie d'un nouveau TV QLED stylé ? Un smartphone à clapet ou bien d'un écran Ultra Wide OLED ? C'est ce qu'on retrouve dans cette sélection de produit du géant sud-coréen.

item.title: YouTube now has a way for parents to block kids from watching Shorts
item.description: Parents will be able to toggle the Shorts time limit on connected children's accounts.

item.title: Animal Crossing’s big 3.0 update has fans itching to return to the cozy life
item.description: Animal Crossing, like Kirby, has come back when it seems like the world needs it most. In 2020, Animal Crossing: New Horizons released on the Nintendo Switch. The game instantly became a smash hit, providing a much-needed place to safely gather with friends amidst the global shutdown of the covid-19 pandemic. In the almost six […]

item.title: Archaeologists Uncover Gigantic Medieval Ship With Features Seen Only on Paper
item.description: The shipwreck is exceptionally preserved and provides the first archaeological confirmation of features seen in illustrations.

item.title: Oubliez les fauteuils gaming : voici la chaise de bureau ergonomique qui prend (vraiment) soin du dos [Sponso]
item.description: Si pendant un temps les chaises orientées gaming ont eu le vent en poupe, nombreux sont les utilisateurs à revenir à des fauteuils plus sobres, mieux conçus et plus durables. La Doro C300 de Sihoo s’inscrit complètement dans cette nouvelle tendance.

item.title: Ce SSD WD_Black de 4 To est à 355 € au lieu de 1 069 € : profitez des soldes avant la flambée des prix
item.description: Avoir le plus de place possible sur votre PC ou votre PS5, ça devient compliqué avec les prix qui s'envolent déjà. Heureusement que les soldes d'hiver 2026 sont là et qu'elles font passer le SSD WD_Black SN850X 4 To à 355 euros sur Amazon alors qu'il est affiché à 1 069 euros chez le fabricant.

item.title: YouTube adds more parental controls, including a way to block teens from watching Shorts
item.description: YouTube is rolling out some additional parental controls, including a way to set time limits for viewing Shorts on teen accounts. In the near future, parents and guardians will be able to set the Shorts timer to zero on supervised accounts. "This is an industry-first feature that puts parents firmly in control of the amount of short-form content their kids watch," Jennifer Flannery O'Connor, YouTube's vice president of product management, wrote in a blog post. Along with that, take-a-break and bedtime reminders are now enabled by default for users aged 13-17. The platform is also bringing in n...

item.title: Microsoft might have just leaked Forza Horizon 6’s release date
item.description: Microsoft is getting ready to show the first gameplay of Forza Horizon 6 next week, and it might also be ready to put a date on its release, too. X poster Xbox Infinite claims they received a Forza Horizon 6 preorder notification inside Forza Horizon 5, implying that the release date of the new title […]

item.title: I’m a backup and recovery provider, but here’s why you shouldn’t just trust me
item.description: In factories and hospitals, backup systems fail silently every day. Here's what vendors won't tell you.

item.title: AI is no SKU—and what that means for the enterprise
item.description: Buying AI is easy but turning it into business value is where most organizations fail.

item.title: Our favorite 3-in-1 wireless charger from UGreen is 32 percent off right now
item.description:
You can easily spruce up your nightstand or desk by decluttering a bit, replacing some of those annoying charging cables with a good wireless charging setup. One of our favorites that can handle three devices at once is the UGREEN MagFlow Qi2 3-in-1 Charger Station 25W. Normally $140, it's on sale right now for $95; that's 32 percent off and only about $5 more than its record-low price.
This is our top pick for a 3-in-1 charging pad thanks to its versatility. The UGREEN can work equally well as a permanent fixture in your home or act as a portable charging station. It boasts a foldable desig...

item.title: Pillion trailer: Alexander Skarsgård and Harry Melling heat up biker BDSM romance
item.description: Harry Lighton's critically acclaimed BDSM romance "Pillion" hits U.S. theaters just in time for Valentine's Day. Trailer.

item.title: In Photos: One Week Since the Shooting of Renee Nicole Good in Minneapolis
item.description: Protests across Minnesota—and around the country—are ongoing, as residents demonstrate against their federal government.

item.title: Galaxy S26 : Samsung corrigerait enfin le plus gros défaut du petit smartphone
item.description: Cela fait maintenant des années que Samsung réserve les vraies nouveautés de charge au modèle Ultra. Une nouvelle fuite laisse entendre que le Galaxy S26 pourrait, lui aussi, enfin accélérer sérieusement côté batterie.

item.title: Tesla will only offer subscriptions for Full Self-Driving (Supervised) going forward
item.description: It's a huge change to Tesla's approach with FSD, and it could impact Musk's $1T pay package and the company's myriad legal troubles.

item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: Heinz’s clever new french fry box fixes a decades-old design problem
item.description: The company is testing its patent-pending ‘Heinz Dipper” box in 30-plus restaurants and sports stadiums. Heinz’s newest product isn’t a ketchup, or a mayo, or some Frankenstein combination of the two. It’s a box—and it’s solving a problem that’s plagued lovers of french fries for decades.

item.title: Après la RAM, un autre élément vital pour les puces va faire grimper les prix
item.description: Si encore il n'y avait que la mémoire qui posait problème. Mais d'autres composants électroniques prisés par l'industrie de l'IA font aussi défaut aux constructeurs d'appareils électroniques. Apple et tous les autres doivent ainsi se battre pour obtenir du tissu de fibre de verre, un élément indispensable pour les circuits imprimés des puces.

item.title: The Nintendo Switch 2025 year in review is finally here
item.description: We’re almost exactly halfway through January, but Nintendo has clearly taken a better-late-than-never approach to its 2025 year in review feature, which finally went live this week for Switch and Switch 2 users. All you need to do is head here and sign into your Nintendo account to see your 2025 breakdown. Like most annual gaming wrap-ups, Nintendo's shows how many games you played over the calendar year, as well as your total playtime. It also shows you your most-played titles for each month, your preferred genres by percentage, and if you scroll all the way to the bottom you can choose your ...

item.title: Security researchers warn Telegram links can doxx you – even with a VPN
item.description: A simple click on a disguised link could reveal your real IP address to attackers. Researchers warn that this Telegram flaw overrides internal proxy and VPN settings, putting privacy-focused users at risk.

item.title: I've tested the cool and colorful Ninja BlendBOSS, and making silky smoothies has bever been so much fun
item.description: Whip up your favorite smoothies and shakes at home, then take them anywhere with the BlendBOSS's 26oz travel tumbler.

item.description: La coupe du monde de football et Top Chef directement depuis Prime Video.

item.title: Rachat de Warner Bros : Netflix modifierait son offre pour écarter définitivement Paramount
item.description: Alors que Paramount multiplie les actions pour s'accaparer Warner Bros, Netflix réagirait. L'entreprise songerait à modifier son offre de rachat pour écarter la menace de Paramount.

item.title: « C’est si nul… Je n’arrive pas à y croire ! » : Même GOG en a marre de Windows
item.description: Le nouveau propriétaire de GOG manque de mots tendres pour Windows. Il annonce que ses équipes travaillent au support de Linux en 2026.

item.title: These are the best laptop deals available this week in the US and UK — 14 of the top offers I'd buy with Black Friday behind us
item.description: I've rounded up all of the best laptop deals available this week in the US and the UK, including everything from bargain Chromebooks to high-performance powerhouses.

item.title: VPN interest spikes in Uganda as the internet gets disrupted ahead of the general elections
item.description: Despite the blocked access to the public internet, people in Uganda seem to be using VPNs to stay connected. Proton VPN confirmed a 8,000% increase in signups on Tuesday, and usage keeps rising.

item.title: ServiceNow patches critical security flaw which could allow user impersonation
item.description: The bug is dubbed "BodySnatcher" and was given a severity score of 9.3/10.

item.title: NBC Sports’ new real-time player tracking lets viewers focus on their favorite athletes
item.description: NBC Sports introduced a new AI-powered player tracking system that will let viewers on mobile devices zoom in and focus on their favorite athletes. It's the first time the viztrick AiDi technology, which was developed by Japan's Nippon Television Network, will be used by another broadcaster. NBC Sports plans to implement the feature for its […]

item.title: This four-star smart ring is a 'cheap alternative to Oura and Samsung' — and it just dropped to its best price since Black Friday on Amazon
item.description: The RingConn Gen 2 is one of the best smart rings if you're on a budget, and t's even cheaper today thanks to this Amazon deal.

item.title: Pixel 9 Pro : l’ancienne gloire de Google revient à un super prix pour les soldes d’hiver
item.description: Le Pixel 9 Pro est l'ancien smartphone haut de gamme de Google, mais il reste un excellent choix en 2026, surtout pour la partie photo. On le trouve sur Boulanger à 669 euros au lieu de 1 199 euros à l'occasion des offres des soldes d'hiver.
